title: HashKey becomes first Hong Kong licensed retail crypto trading service
description:
HashKey Exchange has been licensed to offer crypto trading services to retail users in Hong Kong, making it the first exchange to offer such services in the region. According to an Aug. 3 press statement, the exchange upgraded its type 1 and 7 licenses to offer crypto trading services to retail investors. Part of the […]

The post HashKey becomes first Hong Kong licensed retail crypto trading service appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Binance Users in China Traded $90 Billion of Crypto Assets in a Month, Report
description: Traders in China have reportedly exchanged $90 billion worth of cryptocurrencies on Binance despite a ban on their trading in the country. According to a report quoting internal figures and sources, the volume made the People’s Republic Binance’s biggest market. Binance Processed Monthly Crypto Transactions Worth $90 Billion in China Despite Ban Users of Binance, […]

title: AI-Powered Ultrasound Scanner Receives FDA Approval for Prenatal Care
description: Paris-based femtech company Sonio has achieved a significant milestone in prenatal care with its AI-powered ultrasound scanner, Sonio Detect, becoming the first product to receive FDA approval. Sonio Detect can revolutionize prenatal care by enhancing ultrasound images and aiding in the early identification of birth defects, ultimately leading to better health outcomes for mothers and ... Read more

title: AI-Driven Drug Approval Propels Pharos iBio Shares to New Heights
description: Pharos iBio, a pharmaceutical company specializing in AI-driven drug development, witnessed a significant surge in its shares after announcing the therapeutic use approval of PHI-101, a revolutionary treatment for relapsed or refractory acute myeloid leukemia (AML). The approval, granted by the Ministry of Food and Drug Safety, marks a groundbreaking moment for the pharmaceutical industry ... Read more

title: Bitnovo reveals Spain’s rapidly increasing crypto adoption
description: Spanish cryptocurrency company Bitnovo conducted research to understand how Spanish citizens see cryptocurrency growth in the country. title: Shiba Inu whale activity plummets despite uptick in burn rate
description: Shiba Inu (SHIB) witnesses a decline in whale activity as the whale transaction count drops drastically amid consolidation above the $0.000008 mark. The recent decline persists despite a slight uptick in the 24-hour burn rate. Per data provided by the…

description:

title: Genesis Extends Mediation for the Last Time, Says Its Lawyer
description:
Bankrupt crypto lender Genesis has extended its mediations with creditors for the last time, a company lawyer said during a hearing on Wednesday. The crypto lender will move forward with its existing bankruptcy plan if the parties don’t come to a deal by August 16, according to Bloomberg. Sean O’Neal, Genesis’ lawyer, told US Bankruptcy […]
